description: Try our easy to follow Choc-A-Bloc recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate cake,Pescatarian,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Chocolate,Raspberry,Sesame free
name: Choc-A-Bloc Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 18x28cm shallow pan with baking paper. Melt butter and chocolate in a medium pan over low heat until smooth. Stir in sugar and set aside for 5 minutes to cool slightly.
Stir egg and fudge chunks into chocolate mixture. Sift flours and cocoa together and stir in to thoroughly combine. Spread evenly into pan and bake for 25 minutes or until cooked. Cool.

Meanwhile, beat cream cheese, butter, sugar and vanilla together until creamy. Cut brownie into 8 x 7cm rounds. Top half of the rounds with filling. Top with raspberries and repeat layers, finishing with raspberries. Dust with icing sugar, to serve.
